Fetch the results for the project Id and backtest Id provided (and optional chart name provided). The /backtests/read API accepts requests in the following format:

ReadBacktestRequest Model - Request to read a single backtest from a project.
projectId integer
required
Id of the project that contains the backtest.
backtestId string
required
Id of the backtest to read.
Example 
{
  "projectId": 0,
  "backtestId": "string"
}
